badge-global-comparison.description: Preference for the global warming visualization (badges vs footnotes)
badge-global-comparison.instruction:
### Comparing footnotes and visualization badges

Here, you see the **same visualization twice**: one version with **visualization badges** and one version with **footnotes**. Both versions include the **same information** but shown differently.

response.prompt: **(a) For understanding this visualization yourself, which version do you prefer?**
options: I prefer the version with visualization badges (left)
I prefer the version with footnotes (right)

response.prompt: **(b) For presenting and explaining this visualization to others (like in the speech you wrote), which version would you prefer to use?**
options: I prefer the version with visualization badges (left)
I prefer the version with footnotes (right)
